Montgomery.Temple Beth Or:
Temple Beth Or (formerly Kahl Montgomery) is an historic reform Jewish congregation in Montgomery, Alabama.


== History ==
Jews in Montgomery first established Chevra Mevacher Cholim, a society to minister to the sick and bury the dead in 1846. A congregation, named Kahl Montgomery, was formed on May 6, 1849, first meeting in the homes of members, and later renting space on Dexter Avenue.
